pr_title: Include the context and descriptor in the field model since they are missing

timeline.message: fix: Include the context and descriptor in the field model since they are missing.

timeline.bodyText: Don't we have a utility for copying? Even if it does the same thing, it's probably best to reference that function incase we want to change the implementation universally
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: Is this field model truly empty? Could this variable be named better?
timeline.author: gkillough
